name: Android v1.3.12
description:
This is a submission to the Ryan Laley Games Jam 2020, the theme was to build an Escape Room.

The game is english only, but also perfectly playable without sound.

This is the first game project that our little team of 3 has ever done and we're super excited to share it with you guys! We are also open to any feedback so please let us know what you liked/disliked in the comments, thanks!

Some Sound Effects used from https://freesfx.co.uk/
